title: What is the best elliptical machine in the USA (budget $1000-$1500)? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are different types of Ellipticals like the best elliptical under 800, best elliptical under 700, best home elliptical under $1000, etc. Before you start market research, you should be aware of the general market trend, and about the best in-demand models of ellipticals under 1000 category! Of course, the product review and relevant market feedback can help you impeccably. But you need to find out the professional elliptical products already labeled as a performer in the consumer market within your budget. Here, I would like to suggest for “SCHWINN 470 ELLIPTICAL MACHINE” In the world of ellipticals, Schwinn is a reliable brand. Schwinn 470 Elliptical Machine is one of the most popular entry-level ellipticals that work smart and it is easy to assemble. It is built with a 3-speed fan, cup holder, mobile phone holder, and iPad holder with USB port, which we have liked a lot while using it.  The Schwinn 470 Elliptical is marked as one of the top-of-the-line trainers because of its great quality, the facility of fluid motion, and new features. The elliptical will keep you inspired and motivated – from versatile workout options to app-based tracking tools like RunSocial or Schwinn Trainer. FEATURES WE HAVE LIKED Great connectivityThe machine runs on Bluetooth connectivity, which gets syncs with the Schwinn Trainer App and other similar apps for fitness tracking. World-class training at homeThe app gets sync with free downloadable Run Social App and runs through 19 locations with 27-routes together with people all across the world in real-time. 29 workout programsYou can store in the machine at the most 12 profiles, 9 heart-rate control, 4 custom, 2 fitness test, 1 quick start data. 25 levels of resistanceYou will get to enjoy 25 levels of resistance to have a varied range of workout intensity options. Great consoleThe console is made of dual-track LCD displays, media shelf in the console along with speakers with MP3 input port, USB media charging facility and an adjustable fan. Motorized Slant10° motorized adjustable ramp is designed here which has enabled incline control for fun and challenging workouts.

You're better off getting a Concept 2 rowing machine, which can be had for a bit less than $1000 and at that price point completely blows any home elliptical machine out of the water for durability. In coaching fitness, I have never found a piece of exercise equipment which matched the full body results, efficiency, and durability of indoor rowing, which I myself have done since sophomore year in college--20 something years ago. You probably won't be able to handle 90 minutes a day, but the calorie readout it much more accurate than the typical elliptical machine, the exercise is low-no impact, and it conditions virtually your entire body. Between rowing, pushups, squats, and perhaps pullups if you can do them you essentially have all you need to train your entire body. Good luck with your search; if you decide to opt for a rower certainly check out used--they can be had for even less and effectively last forever.
